sections.title: Common Contact Questions
sections.description: Frequently asked questions about contacting us

faqs.question: What's the best way to get technical support?
faqs.answer: For fastest technical support, use our in-app Live Chat feature or email support@pathon.com. Include screenshots and detailed descriptions of your issue for quicker resolution.

faqs.question: How long does it take to get a response?
faqs.answer: Response times vary by channel: Live Chat (minutes), Email support (4-24 hours), Phone (immediate during business hours). Urgent account issues are prioritized.

faqs.question: Can I visit your office in person?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Dhaka headquarters welcomes visitors by appointment. Please email hello@pathon.com to schedule a visit at least 24 hours in advance.

faqs.question: Do you offer support in Bengali?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have Bengali-speaking support agents available through Live Chat, Phone, and Email support during Bangladesh business hours.

faqs.question: How can I partner with Pathon?
faqs.answer: For partnership inquiries, email enterprise@pathon.com with details about your organization and proposed collaboration. Our partnerships team reviews all proposals.

faqs.question: What information should I include when contacting support?
faqs.answer: Include your account email, device/browser details, steps to reproduce the issue, and screenshots. This helps us resolve your issue faster.
